author: fwyzard
body:
Include more libraries and tools in the ROCm package:
  - ROCr headers
  - hipCUB
  - hipBLAS/rocBLAS
  - hipFFT/rocFFT
  - hipSPARSE/rocSPARSE
  - hipSOLVER/rocSOLVER
  - RCCL
  - MIOpen

Merge hipRAND/rocRAND back into the base ROCm tool.

Drop support for Radeon Pro W6800.
title: [do not merge] Revert ROCm to version 6.2.4 and include more tools
